sentences.en: My forearm deflected the first punch.
sentences.cn: 我的前臂挡开了第一拳。

sentences.en: He presses the bolt against a small hexagon tattooed on his forearm. The sizes match.
sentences.cn: 他把螺栓压在他前臂的一个小六边形纹身上。大小匹配。

sentences.en: The forearm and torch of the Statue of Liberty were on display at the Centennial Exposition in Philadelphia, 1876.
sentences.cn: 1876年，自由女神像的前臂和火炬在费城百年博览会上展出。
